Package hms.patient

Class BillingDetails

Object
BillingDetails
public class BillingDetails extends Object
Manages billing details for patients in the hospital system. Handles tasks such as initializing bills, viewing bills, and making payments.

  • Field Details

    • outrecs

      private Map<String,Map<Integer,Map<String,Object>>> outrecs
      Map of all outcome records for appointments. Key: Patient ID, Value: A nested map where: - Key: Appointment ID - Value: A map containing appointment details (e.g., date, service type, prescribed medications, notes).

    • billingList

      public List<Map<String,Object>> billingList
      List of billing records for all patients.

    • CONSULTATION_RATE

      private static final double CONSULTATION_RATE
      The fixed consultation rate for appointments.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • BillingDetails

      public BillingDetails()
      Default constructor. Initializes the outcome records from AppointmentOutcomeRecord and prints the records.

  • Method Details

    • printOutcomeRecords

      public void printOutcomeRecords()
      Prints all outcome records for debugging or administrative purposes.

    • initializeBills

      public void initializeBills(List<Map<String,String>> medicineList)
      Initializes bills based on patient outcome records and medication prices.
      Parameters:
      medicineList - A list of available medications with their details (e.g., name, price).

    • viewAllBills

      public void viewAllBills(String loggedInPatientId)
      Displays all bills for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      loggedInPatientId - The ID of the logged-in patient.

    • makePayment

      public void makePayment(int billingId)
      Marks a bill as paid based on its billing ID.
      Parameters:
      billingId - The ID of the bill to mark as paid.
